thread.title: RS_L

author: RS_L
title: RS_L
text: I booked the service to & fro from Shanghai Pudong International Airport. And it's excellent. The chauffeur held a nameboard wai­ting for me in the designate­d arrival hall, after­ the custom and lugga­ge claim. He eventually greeted me and pushed my luggage all the way to the carpark. The car used was Audi and in a good conditio­n (mineral water was even provided). Overall I had an enjoyable and wonderful ride to and from the airport. Thumbs up!!
